head: cursor/fixing-code-bugs-16bc
title: PGN: keyed move/clock summaries; numeric base/increment; remove formatting
body:
This PR updates PGN processing and sheet outputs.

- Moves Summary: JSON object keyed 1w/1b/2w/2b with SAN values
- Move Clocks Summary: JSON object keyed 1w/1b/... with [%clk] values
- Base Time (minutes) and Increment (seconds) are numeric
- Remove all Google Sheet formatting to reduce timeouts

Latest commit: 01bb7494099ba38098322f44a01fd90bd3f19e42
